title: 202. How Many Doctors Does It Take to Start a Healthcare Revolution?
description: The practice of medicine has been subsumed by the business of medicine. This is great news for healthcare shareholders -- and bad news for pretty much everyone else.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: The practice of medicine has been subsumed by the business of medicine. This is great news for healthcare shareholders -- and bad news for pretty much everyone else.
